usage: Copy and rename this file to zotero-cmd.json. Edit the cmd.

exec.@comment-zoteroBinPath: Please input the path of the Zotero binary file in `zoteroBinPath`.
exec.@comment-zoteroBinPath-tip: The path delimiter should be escaped as `\` for win32. The path is `*/Zotero.app/Contents/MacOS/zotero` for MacOS.
exec.@comment-profilePath: Please input the path of the profile used for development in `profilePath`.
exec.@comment-profilePath-tip: Start the profile manager by `/path/to/zotero.exe -p` to create a profile for development
exec.@comment-dataDir: Please input the directory where the database is located in dataDir
exec.@comment-dataDir-tip: If this field is kept empty, Zotero will start with the default data.
